walledtemplates.settings.default-to-wall: Default newly-created templates to be blocked by walls. You can toggle in each template's configuration.
walledtemplates.settings.default-to-spre: Default newly-created templates to spread. You can toggle in each template's configuration.
walledtemplates.settings.default-to-boun: Default newly-created templates to bounce against walls. You can toggle in each template's configuration.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-menu: When toggle option is selected, a bullseye control button in the template control bar will allow you to switch between targeting or not targeting.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-meth: Method to auto-target tokens with templates. Also controls how grid highlighting works for templates.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-area: For overlap method only. The percent of the token bounds or grid area that must overlap the template to count. 0 means any overlap counts. (Hint: use the arrow keys after clicking the square to increment by steps of 0.01.)
walledtemplates.settings.diagonal-scalin: Scale ray templates to conform with the 5-5-5 diagonal rule.
Scale cone templates to conform with the 5-5-5 diagonal rule.
Convert circle templates to squares to better conform with the 5-5-5 diagonal rule.
